column4: Hi.  I am trying to set up a squid server on a spare box and I have installed 2 network cards.  I can't get eth1 to work.  I can see both cards with lspci, but the interface eth1 is unknown and I don't know what I need to do to make it available.  I am running Ubuntu server 9.04
did your try ifup eth1?; did you configured /etc/network/interfaces ? have a look at that file
well , try sudo ifconfig eth1 xx.xx.xx.xx netmask xx.xx.xx.xx; if it works, then write /etc/network/intefaces and configure it with your desire parameters
